channel.title: SCSS & SASS in Hugo - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Create assets/scss/ Files that begin with _ are not meant to be imported into the SASS compiler. They are meant to be used by other scss files. main.scss file Import other _ files that are in assets/scss: @import "grid"; @import "demo";Import SCSS or SASS Add to /layouts/partials/head.html <title>{{ .Title }}</title> {{ $css := resources.Get "scss/main.scss" }} {{ $css = $css | toCSS }} <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ $css.
